question: Zakaah to a married student
answer:
QUESTION
I am 25 years old and live in Norway. My parents married me last year. Me and my wife are still studying, and my parents affoard our cost / sundries. And of course, my wife did get a lot of jewelery (gold) on our marriage. So , my question is : Do I qualify to pay the Zakah? Once again, I am a student, I have no income, my parent affoard all the sundries, but my wife got a lot of gold on the marriage. The quantity of the gold is more than 'nisaab' limit.
ANSWER


Share:
Zakaat on the gold jewellery is due on your wife and not you. However, you
may pay the Zakaat on her behalf with her consent. Zakaat may be paid in
cash or in kind (clothing, etc.)

And Allah Ta√£la Knows Best.

Was salaam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
